name: Ball Smasher (itch)
description:
This game is really interesting and  it took me 6 days to make this game so plz download!

You are the disco and you shoot the ball.

  • How to play this game:
  • First when you will click on download it will download a Zip file.
  • When the file will be downloaded double click on the Zip file.
  • There you will see a file named with (Party Killer.exe)
  • When you will click on this file it will automatically open in your browser.
  • Controls
  • X or A to join game. 
  •  Left Thumbstick to move.
  •  Right Thumbstick to aim. 
  •  R1 to shoot.
  • The game can be played on mobile phone if you have a keyboard connected.
  • Tools used
  • Unity 2019.3
  • Photoshop CC
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • Leshy SFMaker

If you want to make your own game do visit the channel given: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCW84vTjeRW4OkL5PBdWJ68Q
